name: Pixel bounce face
description:
Pixel bounce face is a pixel art old school arcade where you have to bounce between 2 walls and try to escape from saws.

How to play:
Tap on the screen to start. Player will start bouncing from the left wall to the right and back. To avoid saws you must gain altitude with tapping on the screen.

Features:
- pixel art graphic
- 8bit background music
- simple to play

If you like Pixel bounce face, please give it a rate and a review.
